Initializer# init(_:content:)

StoreKitSwiftUIiOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
init(
    _ label: some StringProtocol,
    @StoreContentBuilder content: () -> Content
)
```

Available when `Content` conforms to `StoreContent`, `Label` is `Text`, and `MarketingContent` is `AutomaticSubscriptionStoreMarketingContent`.## [See Also](/documentation/storekit/subscriptionoptiongroup/init(_:content:)-24grh#see-also)
